name: DC Comics - Zatanna Trivia Quiz | DC Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: Zatanna is the daughter of an early era (1930s/'40s) DC superhero.  What was his name?
questions.explanation:
Giovanni Zatara.

	Giovanni "John" Zatara debuted in 'Action Comics' #1 (1938), along with several other characters.... including Superman!  He appeared regularly in the title until 1950.

questions.text: Zatanna shares a style of casting magic with her father.  What is it?
options: Calling upon dead mystics for assistance
questions.explanation:
Speaking backwards.

	This "style" works well in the non-audio medium of comics.  When Zatanna utters, "laever eht neddih rood!" the reader knows she is wanting to "reveal the hidden door!"

questions.text: Zatanna had a unique introduction.  Created in 1964, she appeared in several stories in various DC titles edited by Julius Schwartz.  In an ongoing story line that spans three years, she is searching for her missing father.  Who does she first team with?
questions.explanation:
Hawkman and Hawkgirl.

	Zatanna Zatara's first appearance was in 'Hawkman' (vol.1) #4.  The "missing father" story line reaches its conclusion in 'Justice League of America' (vol.1) #51 in 1967.

questions.text: What job did Zatanna have prior to discovering her powers (a job she continues to maintain)?
questions.explanation:
Stage illusionist.

	Like her father, Zatanna earned a living by doing stage illusion work for pay.  This was a family business passed on to her father from his uncle.

questions.text: In 1978, Zatanna was extended membership into which DC super hero team?
questions.explanation:
Justice League of America.

	During most of her time with the group, her powers were diminished to being only able to control the four basic elements of water, air, fire and earth.

questions.text: In 1979 the identity of Zatanna's mother was revealed.  Who was she?
questions.explanation:
Sindella.

	Sindella appears in a four issue 'Justice League of American' story arc which ends with her sacrificing her life.

questions.text: Zatanna was a character that crossed between DC's main line of comics, and their Vertigo line.  From the Vertigo titles she had a passionate romantic relationship with whom?
questions.explanation:
John Constantine.

	Their relationship since being lovers has been contentious to say the least.

questions.text: In the limited series 'Identity Crisis' (2004), it is revealed that Zatanna has mind wiped super villains in the past.  She also wipes the mind of a member of the Justice League who objects.  Who is it?
questions.explanation:
Batman.

	Batman later discovers that his mind had been altered and his relationship with Zatanna suffered for a long time afterwards.  He often expressed his inability to trust her.

questions.text: Zatanna has a younger cousin who was a member of the Teen Titans for a brief time (2006-2011).  What is his name?
questions.explanation:
Zachary.

	Zachary Zatara has quite a high opinion of himself and is generally disliked by those around him.

questions.text: With the advent of the revised continuity referred to as "New 52" (2011), Zatanna is a member of what group?
questions.explanation:
Justice League Dark.

	The Justice League Dark is a mystic arm of the League which includes other supernaturally based characters such as Swamp Thing, Madame Xanadu, Man-Bat, and John Constantine.
